text.div:
Example Payment Type Codes

This value set includes example Payment Type codes.

Copyright Statement: This is an example set.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/ex-paymenttype defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
complete CompleteComplete (final) payment of the benefit under the Claim less any adjustments.
partial PartialPartial payment of the benefit under the Claim less any adjustments.

name: Example Payment Type Codes
description: This value set includes example Payment Type codes.

concept.definition: Complete (final) payment of the benefit under the Claim less any adjustments.
Partial payment of the benefit under the Claim less any adjustments.
